chunk-1b1543df794d06ac12399619acc81141.description: Marla, whose real name is Mariam Dosso, is a 19-year-old Ivorian rapper known for her unique style that mixes French, Ivorian slang, and English, thereby influencing the evolution of the French language.

Jean Patrick Niambé, also known as Dofy, is a 24-year-old Ivorian hip-hop artist who contributes to the evolution of the French language by creating words from his own realities, reflecting the influence of African experiences on the language.

chunk-050f218ffbe46e8cd0f8d6eb74153087.description: A group that attacked Israel on October 7th and is involved in the conflict in Gaza, being condemned by Harvard's president Claudine Gay for 'terrorist atrocities'.
